评论详情: Enjoyed the simple dress for Renn Faire under my corset. Got it on a sale so that was a benefit. The little lift in the skirt helps it also be breathable, I also recall this being see through unless a nude bra is worn as it is on the thinner side, so be warned.
Cute- just not my style
This dress was just what I needed for Ren fest. It not only arrived quickly, but was flattering, super comfortable and just as described.

Deep neck line so it makes it pretty much impossible to cover under garments. This type of dress is very baggy for ladies with a flat chest sadly and I was unable to wear it to FanX.  Also very high cut
Should have gotten a size smaller, but it is cute otherwise.
Beautiful and excellent fit! Very flattering and can be worn at many different events. Not see through which is what I was worried about.
I ordered this to wear under a corset and over skirt to the renaissance fair. It was comfortable and sturdy, fit perfectly.
A rare Amazon find that doesn’t feel like you got it from Amazon! Super flowy and flattering!
It is hard for me to find dresses that I LOVE and this is one dress that I love! My husband even said something about my smile when I tried it on! And I love love the Pockets!!!
This dress was very comfortable and the size was just right  230 lbs an my bust is a 40ddd everything fit perfectly

评论概述: Flattering for both thick and thin
评论详情: I always struggle ordering online now I’m on the thicker side. You never know if a dress will show every part that you don’t want showing (I.E. extra rolls if you’re like me), but this dress is incredibly flattering and comfortable! It’s a great dress to dress up for the fair and can be added to for a more dramatic look, but also not too crazy for a first time person dressing up.  The only downfall is that it is very hard to get the wrinkles out if you do not have a steamer. My steamer got them right out though.
Fabric I'd kinda cheap has that plastic feel to it

I love this so much. I sized down because of the reviews and I'm glad I did, it fits like it was made for me. The color is as is on the listing. It's not expensive material or anything, but for what it is and what it's for it is definitely worth it. I love the shape and the option to pull one side up if wanted. I am definitely going to order more colors.

评论概述: Runs large in chest, cheap material
评论详情: The chest as seen in video was massive for a small size. And I’ve seen this pattern in all their dresses. They make nothing for small chested women and that is disappointing. The dress design and sewing is well done but it should be cotton or linen or wool. This material not only looks and feels cheap and costume like but is also toxic to body.
It was too big and too small at the same time. The whole garnet was too big but the amount of bust was so little and I am not well endowed there.
The fabric feels cheap and doesn't drape well.  The zipper broke on the first wearing.

评论概述: Thin fabric, perfect for Renn Faire
评论详情: I got this dress to wear for Renn Faire and it was perfect! True to size, very flattering, and great to wear alone or with a corset. I wore it for 12 hours and it held up well! The material is very thin which makes me think it might tear with repeated wear.
Item arrived dirty and tag had been cut off and tied back on. Appeared to be used and then returned.
Bought for Renaissance festival. Fit great and light weight
lowkey love this dress, just overpriced. I bought it for halloween but i’m probably going to wear it on other occasions too.
This brand makes very high quality corsets and period costumes, I love them!
Very cute and flattering. Used as a vampire Halloween costume.

My partner and I dressed as dragon and donkey from shrek and this dress was perf! (Honestly I didn’t buy it thinking we were dressing as that but hey it worked out and people loved it!) The dress feels really well made and great for the price. Looks just like the photos and isn’t too heavy or thin. I love that there are pockets!! There is a zipper but honestly it’s stretchy enough that I didn’t need it. When I did try using it though, the zipper got stuck somewhere and got misaligned. It was thankfully fixed though once it got all the way back down. So tbh maybe just get it over with the stretch don’t use the zipper lel

评论概述: Fits well.  Color as depicted.  Nice fabric.
评论详情: Very happy with purchase.  Fabric is not too clingy and has a good weight to it.
Looked awesome on true to size

The material is way sturdier than I anticipated, yet it has a perfect stretch. There are pockets! The adjustable slit is adorable. It’s very flattering. I am 5’7” and weigh about 165lbs. I would normally wear a large or extra large, but based on reviews I went with a medium for a more fitted look and I’m glad I did. It’s perfectly snug in all the right places.

This dress is pretty nice! I highly recommend ironing it before wearing, because it is not super thick fabric so it's prone to wrinkling. It makes a world of difference, trust me.  It was comfortable to wear all day, and if you want to wear it outside of a Ren Faire atmosphere, it's passible as just a cute cottage core outfit. I wore nip covers with it, and you couldn't see them through the fabric.  If your shoulders/arms are sensitive and don't like having tight spots on your sleeves, you might not like it. I am able to get used to it but sometimes that kind of thing bothers me so!  Overall pretty worth. If you want a quick little thing to wear without much prep, get it!
My granddaughter says she is keeping it.  It fits great and is well made.
Got this to wear under my corset and skirt.  It was comfortable and light. I would say I couldn’t sized down one. It was a little loose up top. For reference I am 36DDD 5’3 and 146lbs.

评论概述: Cute dress and it has pockets !!
评论详情: I got a size large and I am 150 pounds.  I am 5 foot 2 inches so maybe I could have even done a med. I over all love the dress and the material is good quality. I am wearing it the for renaissance festival.
Not the best material for everyday use. But great for a costume

I got the large and it fits just as described. I didn't end up wearing this one to the renaissance fair, but I likely will next year. I kept it because I like the color and the feel of it. It's light weight and if you live in Arizona like me, you want that when it's hot.
Just as the headline reads, this dress was super cute and comfy. I paired it with a simple broad black belt to complete the renaissance look.

I was going to just use this for my Halloween costume and was expecting all that much but this dress was absolutely gorgeous! I love the little protective skirt underneath as it makes it feel more safe to wear when it’s a little more windy or when you have the string pulled out all the way up, looked beautiful with the corset I got to go with it, fits nicely and is pretty good quality. I will say tho a slight problem I had was the shoulders. It would be on my shoulders and fall down, but when it was done would start to slide down and show my bra, it was an easy fix but was annoying while it happened.

This product fit great!…. From the waist down. The elastic on the neckline meant my generous tatas were tap dancing with my belly button—that is to say, they were putting on a show. It might have worked had the neckline been as uncompromising as the fabric or if the silly useless drawstrings in the middle were, well, drawstrings. As it was, the dress is suited for the Ren Faire’s 21+ day-drinking day, no kids allowed, which I’m certainly not comfortable with. That also means I can’t include a photo to show you. Just trust me on this.  The material of the fabric itself also seemed cheap, with a slip that felt as ghastly as the most inexpensive, polyester microfiber bedsheets. With the price of the dress, it’s not that big of a shock, but I had really hoped for something I could wear everyday like a mushroom-foraging princess. Instead, it’s like a Halloween costume cast off.  If you’re looking for a disposable, inexpensive, one-time wear, and you regularly can forego over-the-shoulder boulder-holders, this might work for you. For me? It’s a return. Sorry.  Oh, two stars instead of one because from the waist-down, it fit lovely. Also, I think it is mostly meant to be a costume, and for that it would work.
This was a lovely dress, and I purchased it in Several colors. It runs true to size so 2X is huge and large is large so you can count on ordering your size and it fitting well.

This is a great dress! It fits beautifully, and the quality is fantastic. I’m 5'2", and the length was perfect with boots, which is a big win for me. It does run a bit big, so I’d recommend double-checking the size chart before ordering. The fabric is breathable but still thick enough to wear through many seasons. Overall, I absolutely love it! Whether for a special occasion, a costume piece, or just to feel fabulous, this dress is definitely a keeper!

评论概述: Beautiful color, soft and comfortable and has pockets
评论详情: I bought this dress and this overcoat (https://a.co/d/cOADAMx) from the same seller for Renaissance Festival. I have wanted to dress up for YEARS but I've never found the right outfit. This was the most comfortable and flattering outfit combination I have ever worn. AND IT HAS POCKETS!! Like real deep pockets (the outer layer also has pockets) I kept forgetting my phone was even in them because they were so secure. I have gained a lot of weight since becoming a mom, and I've never had much self esteem. The only other time I have felt this good about the way I looked was at my wedding.  The material seemed very durable but also very comfortable. It didn't get dirty when I was sitting on the ground or playing with my daughter. I have not been given anything to write this review. It was just that amazing! I would wear this as an everyday outfit if I could. 10/10 would recommend and would buy again
I purchased this dress for our local Renaissance festival and it was perfect!
Super comfortable and flattering!! With zipper, pockets, adjustable skirt length! Wore it to the Renaissance fair and was comfy all day!  Purchase this dress.  You won’t be disappointed 🥳
Beautiful dress that's so comfortable It's soft and not constricting I have purchased several dresses from this seller Can't wait to see what colors get added Need to buy a few more

The quality of the material was nice, my only issue was trying to get wrinkles out. I am 5ft 125lbs and the size small was perfect and still had some breathing room. As someone who is short I was worried it would look too long but it wasn’t too bad.
Came with a massive black stain on the front, clearly was used and returned previously. Color of fabric is more yellow than white/beige as advertised.
Loved it!
I’m 5’2 and 135lbs, and I got a small. The back is shirred so it gives you a nice stretch if needed. The color is very bold and red, and the material is good and not thin. I definitely recommend!

I bought this dress for a Medieval Times event. It did not fail to look and feel great. I received some compliments from the staff members. Telling me I looked great and my family as well. I do recommend this dress and I will wear it again throughout the fall season.
This was perfect for the renaissance fair we attended. The edges of the neckline showed part of my bra, but I wore a bra the same color as the dress (black).
Much better than expected  Quality is excellent  Long enough for a taller person  Fits true to size

I thought this dress would be cute and sassy, but at 5’ 3”  it looks very long and matronly on me, even with the slit cinched up high. I need it for a specific themed event, so I’m keeping it, but don’t love it at all.
The look of this dress is so cute and works well for the Renaissance fair. But the material is cheap and traps heat making it extremely uncomfortable.
I love how comfortable it was! I wore mine to the Renaissance festival and had no issues wearing it all day in the heat! I love the ruffles and cinched bottom, easy to adjust for your preference.
Fit great, felt comfortable and was good quality.
Love the dress! Super comfortable flowy a perfect for the Renaissance Fair! Quality material has a slip underneath which is really nice. Looking forward to wearing this for years to come!
Cute dress but it showed up completely covered with mysterious stains.
Love it creating my Halloween costume early but not only is it perfect for my costume I can also just wear it normally and it's so pretty and makes me look great
I’m 5ft and 110lbs and bought a small. The quality and material is nice but ultimately returned because felt it was too large. I would have purchased an XS but they don’t sell XS.

it has pockets! :D  i am normally a Medium, but chose to size up to a Large because i like the off-the-shoulder look. plus, i was planning on wearing a corset, so i wasn't worried about the dress falling off.  the left side of the skirt's length can be controlled by the ties; i found that as the day got hotter, i wanted more ventilation, so i wound up using a skirt hike on the other side. i am 5ft tall and found the length of the dress to be perfect.  fabric was easy to wash; just very wrinkly but i didn't care too much about that.

This dress is absolutely beautiful and such good quality. I was not expecting it to be this comfortable! It fits perfectly and hugs your body in the right spots but has enough stretch to be comfy. It has a short slip under it so it’s not see through at all. Even the chest isn’t see through, ftn! The material is so soft and flowy I love it so much! I can’t wait to complete the look this weekend at the renaissance faire :)

It is a beautiful dress, I do recommend ensuring fit I sized up definitely could have gotten a size down. The sting adjusts the height of the ruffle lift, and the drawstring is a pretty touch to thw front. It has a side zipper for ease of getting on and off.

评论概述: Cute design but awful fit and material
评论详情: I really like the hiked hemline but the material was awful, like a shower liner. I bought a large but it was too big.

Fits nothing like in the picture. The shoulders are too big to stay up and I did not want an off the shoulder dress, but when I pulled them up the bust area sagged even more. The bodice is not cut like in the photo, it’s much shorter, and the skirt is pleated so it poofs out oddly and makes you so much wider. This might work for the skinny size S or M ladies, but I wear a size 14 and this is a 2x. Absolutely not for bigger girls. It also was inside out and wadded up in the bag, so I’m not the only one who thought it was absolutely horrible.
I used this for Ren Faire and it was great! Very comfortable, great quality for its price. I matched it with one of Scarlet Darkness' corset and they were just perfect.

Flows very nicely, soft material and very cute. Did not realize there were pockets when I bought it, and they're pretty roomy. Took off a star for stray string in front of the right pocket, slightly annoying but still a great and cute dress for the price :)

I bought this dress in 3 colors.  Comfy, cute, POCKETS, need I say more?? Had enough space for my large chest, and not too tight on the arms.  I feel so pretty in this dress, and it has room for a belly. I'm just fat but I think it would work for maternity as well.
This dress was sent to me clearly used. It smells like strong perfume and has makeup (or boogers-not sure) crusted to the front. It’s dry clean only so I can’t just throw it in the wash.
Fits nice

My brother and sister-in-law had a Lord of the Rings themed baby shower and this dress was perfect for the party! It was really comfortable as an all day wear, and it looked just like what a Hobbit would wear! It fits true to size - I ordered a medium and was glad I did. The pockets were a really nice add and it wasn't at all transparent. Overall, I was so happy with this purchase! I want to find more reasons to wear it!!

I bought this dress four separate times and every time I inspect it, the stitching work was subpar. Most of the dresses had many loose threads sticking out; a few were easy to pull out, but occasionally there would be one that just kept coming undone. Two of the dresses that I ordered also looked used because they were disheveled in the packaging.  Most importantly, I didn’t like that the seller purposefully overpriced this dress (the seller originally priced this at around $42.99), but you can find the same thing on Aliexpress for $23 as of now. It actually arrives new and is better quality; the fabric is similar and the stitching isn’t bad.  To conclude, I don’t recommend supporting this business.

I love my new dress it fit just right and is light weight which was what I was looking for… I used it as a pirate dress for work and was so in love I purchased it in another color for the renaissance fair I’m going to.

This is a very average dress. Pros: 1) It fits (my normal size US 18, I ordered XXL). The back ruching stretches well and the bust is large enough for my 40DDDs. 2) It’s affordable for my size. 3) It has decent sized pockets. Cons: 1) The fabric feels lightweight but it’s very obviously a fabric that isn’t going to breathe well. 2) The fabric is also incredibly wrinkly and the dress will need multiple washings and probably some intense ironing before I can wear it out. 3) The color is not accurate at all. I was anticipating a rich green. This is definitely in the olive/army green realm. It still matches my corset ok, but not 100% what I wanted. If I could find other affordable options, I would probably return it but it’s as good as it’s going to get for me.

评论概述: So cute even on plus sizes!
评论详情: Bought this for a photoshot, and it was so comfortable. It was definitely worth the money to get it (I bought it in 2 colors too!) It fit well, and the length was comfortable as well, with the split just above the knee.

I bought this dress for a fairy-themed wedding and was really happy with it. This was very comfortable. But I am only giving 4 stars as it was not very breathable and it also wrinkled SUPER easily. It does have a small slip underneath, so it is not see-through, but the fabric is still quite thin. BTW, I am a size 16/18 and got an XL - it was the perfect size.

I bought this dress to go with a corset I bought and I love it. It fits perfectly. It is not remotely see through and the cut is very flattering. Paired with my corset I received so many compliments on it. I've washed it several times and it's held up just fine. The adjustable hem line is a fun feature and even at its shortest I don't feel exposed.

I got lots of compliments on this cute dress. It fits true to size. I ordered up a size and wish I hadn’t. It’s very comfortable, lightweight,  and made me feel beautiful. The materials are great. I was worried about it being see-through, but it is not. I liked it so much, I bought another one in a different color!
This dress is super light and flowy. Perfect for summer

I wore this to a ren fair and was really comfortable in it. At first I thought it was going to be too lose when I put it on but I didn’t realize there were strings in the back too you can tighten it up. Fit is true to size
Bought this dress for our local renaissance festival and worked so well! Great fit and quality. It was comfortable to wear all day
I really wasn’t sure how this would fit as a chubby gal but this seems so well designed! It hit me exactly right on the bust and waist, will be perfect for my RenFaire costume.
This dress is super comfy and the fit is great. I love the adjustable tie on the front so you can make the slit to your comfort level.

评论概述: Weird fabric but fine for a costume
评论详情: Weird, heavy synthetic fabric. It’ll work for what I need but wouldn’t wear for anything but a costume. More expensive than what it should be imo.

I don't always trust the size charts, but this one is accurate. I'm very pleased with this dress and it is very flattering. The only reason it doesn't get 5 stars across the board is the pic is not the blue it appears to be. The pic makes it look like a peacock blue, it is far more sky blue as the name of it suggests. But overall a comfortable dress (although the elastic around the torso did get a bit irritating the longer I wore it). Definitely a great option for Ren Faires and the like.
I wore this to the renaissance fair and felt that it worked well for me! Its stretchy material and still flattering on me!
This dress is super cute, fits amazing and the quality is great. This is a fantastic deal.

I really like this dress for what it is- a costume garment. It’s cute and sexy and fits pretty well. This isn’t the kind of thing anyone can wear on its own, but layered with skirts and a bodice or belt helps make this a more wearable garment. I like the color a lot. If you follow the size chart, it should fit. Mine did!
Beautiful color, great price, comes with hidden side zipper for easy on & off!

I’m 5ft 5inches and 120lbs. I bought size Small and it fit me like a medium or large. The dress has stretch fabric in the back but had about 4-6 inches extra around it making it look really baggy on me and not form fitting. The top is also really loose. I’m a cup size B and about 36 inches around the breast. There’s no way to tighten the top. It’d have to wear this dress only with the sleeves up or the top will be falling down off my chest. The texture of fabric is that cheap polyester - it feels like the stuff tents are made of- and isn’t breathable at all. I bought this dress to wear at ren fair and haven’t decided if it’s worth my time trying to fix or not. My final statement is that the dress is definitely not worth what it costs and im disappointed; however it does have pockets which is a plus.
Fits nicely, material and color perfect.
Love the craftsmanship and quality of this dress, I will be making more purchases in the future with this brand

I’m going to my second Renaissance Fair this spring and wanted to dress the part this time. This dress is made with great care and quality. I spent a little more than I thought or wanted to but glad I did. I bought a large, and it fits to size. It’s light, but not thin. There are no seams separating or fraying. You can wear the sleeves up or off the shoulder. The color is on point. It’s so comfortable to wear, there are no areas that feel scratchy or rough. I’m so impressed with the quality. It’s machine washable so that makes it a huge pro!
I ordered this dress for ren faires and it’s sooo cute! I ordered a lil too big but love the way it fit all the same! and the lil leg cinch is so flattering. love.
Well made, light material, & fit great! This dress is absolutely worth getting!!!

I honestly wasn’t expecting much but the quality of the material was great. Not too thin and not sheer or anything. I got it for a Halloween costume but it’s actually pretty enough to wear for another occasion too.

评论概述: Looks great, but the drawstring on the chest is fake
评论详情: The dress was very beautiful, the material and build were great, but the chest area drawstring is just two pieces of string, not an actual drawstring for you to control the tightness around the chest area
Love the color, but the material is very cheap for the price point.
I wore this to a Renaissance fair. It was comfy,  I put shorts underneath, I looked the part

评论概述: Nice dress for Ren faire events if you don't mind over heating while wearing the dress.
评论详情: ... the dress arrived in a teeny tiny plastic package, severely wrinkled. Tried to hand wash the dress, failed.  Had to pay a dry cleaner to steam out all the wrinkles.  The top of the dress fits nice, but the hip area... yikes. I felt like a pear in the dress. The material is light, and you will notice, after a few hours,  the dress material is 95% polyester.. it's too late to return my dress so I will try to resell or donate to our local community aid.
My wife will using it during our local renaissance festival.  Well made dress, liked the material, zipper on the side to put on and take off much easier.  Hidden pocket is very nice
Girlfriend loves this to go with her Renaissance festival costume. Pairs great with a brown belt, brown leggings, and brown high boots
Dress fit as expected, was excellent for a costume party.  True red color.
